lounge.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a waiting room at an airport
lounge.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a public room in a hotel or other building, that is used by many people as a place to relax
lounge.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the main room in a house where people relax, watch television etc
lounge.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to stand, sit, or lie in a lazy or relaxed way
lounge.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Nathan was lounging on the grass bank outside the cottage.
